scrape

scrape.py - Web scraper for The Grad Cafe admission results.

This module uses urllib to fetch pages and BeautifulSoup to parse HTML, extracting graduate school admission data for analysis.

src.module_2.scrape.load_data(filename='applicant_data.json')[source]

Load data from a JSON file.

Parameters:

filename – Input filename

Returns:

List of applicant dictionaries

src.module_2.scrape.save_data(data, filename='applicant_data.json')[source]

Save data to a JSON file.

Parameters:

  • data – List of applicant dictionaries

  • filename – Output filename

src.module_2.scrape.scrape_data(num_pages=1500, delay=1.0, start_page=1)[source]

Scrape admission data from Grad Cafe.

Parameters:

  • num_pages – Number of pages to scrape (default 1500 for ~30,000 entries)

  • delay – Delay between requests in seconds (be respectful)

  • start_page – Page to start from (for resuming)

Returns:

List of applicant dictionaries
